privacyText:
This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with respect to information they have shared with B7r. This policy does not apply to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. 
 By using our site, you agree to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
termsText: The services offered by B7r include many products and features to help you sell goods and services For buyers, by accessing B7r you confirm that you agree and are bound by the terms of service contained in the terms and conditions below :

sell, ship and promote your products online through

text1: The personal information you are asked to provide will be made clear at the time we ask you to If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message or attachments you may send to us, and any other information you may choose to provide. When you sign up for an account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as your name, company name, address, email address, and phone number.
title2: We use the information we collect in various ways, including:
text2: Operation and maintenance of our site
text3: Improve, customize and expand our website
text4: Understand and analyze how you use our site
text5: Develop new products, services, features and functionality
text6: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including customer service, to provide you with updates and other information regarding the Site or for marketing and send emails
text8: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Hence, you are advised to check this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
text9: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us
termsText1: We may from time to time provide modifications or improvements to the features or functionality of the Services, which may include patches, bug fixes, updates, upgrades and other modifications. Updates may modify or delete certain features or functionality of the Service. You agree that we are under no obligation to provide any updates, or to continue to provide or enable any particular features or functionality of the Service to you. You also agree that all updates will be considered an integral part of the Service, and are subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
termsTitle2: We may display or include third party content (including data, information, applications, and other product services) or provide links to other websites or services (“Third Party Services”). You acknowledge and agree that we are not responsible for any third party services, including their accuracy; Validity, copyright compliance, legality, or any other aspect of it. We do not and will not have any obligation or liability to you or any other person or entity for any Third Party Services. These third party services and links are provided solely for your convenience and you may access and use them entirely at your own risk and subject to the terms and conditions of such third parties.
termsText3: Submitting your personal information through the Store is subject to our
termsText4: If you sign up for any of our plans, you agree to pay all fees and charges to your account for the service in accordance with the fees, charges and billing terms in effect at the time such fees are due.
payText: We may change prices at any time and you agree to pay all fees at the then-current rates and any applicable fees. We reserve the right to refuse any order placed through the Site. We may, at our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased for any person or order. These restrictions may include orders placed by you or by the customer's account for your store.
termsText5: We are entitled to an injunction or other equitable relief in the event of any breach by you. The Service is not intended for distribution or use by any person or entity where such distribution or use would be contrary to law or regulation. Accordingly, people who choose to access our Services illegally do it at their own risk and are solely responsible for compliance with local laws.
termsText6: We do not guarantee that your use of our data output will be uninterrupted and error-free.
termsText7: We do not guarantee that the results that may be obtained from using the data transmitted will always be accurate. In no event shall B7r, its directors, employees or affiliates be liable for any injury, loss or any direct, indirect, special or consequential damages of any kind, including, without limitation, lost profits, or loss of data, or replacement costs, or similar damages, whether based on contract, or negligence, for any claim relating in any way to your use of the Service or any Product, including, without limitation, any errors or omissions in any Content, or any loss or harm of any kind incurred as a result of the use of the Service or any Content (or Product) posted, transmitted or made available via the Service, even if we have been advised of the possibility.
termsText8: Our Platform and its entire contents, features and functionality (including all information, software, text, images, video, audio and design), are owned by us, its licensors or other providers of such material under copyright, trademark and other international intellectual property or proprietary rights laws . termsText9: Any feedback, comments, ideas, improvements or suggestions that you provide to us in connection with the Service shall remain our sole and exclusive property. We will be free to use, copy, modify, publish or redistribute the Suggestions for any purpose and in any way without any compensation to you.
termsText10: This Agreement shall remain in effect until terminated by either you or us. We may, in our sole discretion, at any time and for any or no reason, suspend or terminate this Agreement with or without prior notice. This Agreement will be terminated immediately, without prior notice to us, in the event that you fail to comply with any provision of this Agreement. You may also terminate this Agreement by deleting the Service.
termsText11: Termination of this Agreement will not limit any of our rights or remediesat law or equity in the event that you breach any of your obligations under this Agreement (during the term of this Agreement).

termsText15: We may update our Terms and Conditions from time to time. Hence, you are advised to check this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms and conditions on this page.
